content:
A tragic turn in a corruption investigation that crosses Latin America

ON THE evening of April 16th, Alan García, Peru’s former president, went on the radio to declare he was innocent of accusations of corruption that were swirling around. Rumours of his likely arrest were pure supposition, he insisted: “I can tell you that I was not born to steal.”

He was one of several senior figures caught up in a corruption case that is convulsing Peruvian political life; two other presidents are either in detention or have served time in jail.

The scandal stems from the Lava Jato (“Car Wash”) investigation in Brazil, which has spread to other countries. Brazilian prosecutors have won convictions for 155 people, and prison sentences totalling more than 2,000 years.

One major part of the investigation concerns Odebrecht, a Brazilian construction company, which has been found to have paid billions of dollars in bribes to politicians across Latin America in exchange for lucrative contracts. In Peru more than a dozen politicians, including Mr García, have been implicated since 2016. Last November, prosecutors barred him from leaving the country for 18 months while he was investigated in several Odebrecht-linked cases, particularly allegations of taking bribes in 2008 in connection with the construction of the metro in Lima. He sought asylum in the Uruguayan embassy in Lima, which was denied. In April, details of corruption involving his confidants started to leak; senior Odebrecht officials were set to testify next month.

Mr García’s first term in office, from 1985 to 1990, was marked by disastrous populist policies. In 1989, inflation rocketed above 7,000% and economic output shrank by 12%. But his second term, from 2006 to 2011, went much better. A free-trade agreement with the United States set the stage for subsequent deals with China, the European Union and a number of other countries. Average economic growth was impressive, at about 7% per year, and inflation and unemployment remained low.

Although he oversaw strong economic growth, Mr García’s terms were marked by allegations of graft. Two years after the first ended in 1990 he went into exile in Colombia, living between there and France for eight years to avoid prosecution. He returned to make a remarkable political comeback after the statute of limitations had run out in 2001, and won an election in 2006. After his second term ended in 2011, he was again investigated, only to be let off the hook on technicalities.

The Lava Jato investigation was too extensive to escape, however. It has exposed the corruption and incompetence at the heart of Peruvian politics. Prosecutors have asked the United States to extradite Alejandro Toledo, Mr García’s predecessor, who stands accused of accepting a $20m bribe from Odebrecht (he denies the allegation). Both of Mr García’s successors are also implicated: Ollanta Humala spent nearly nine months in prison. He was released a year ago this month, pending trial for allegedly receiving $3m in undeclared campaign funds from the construction giant. Pedro Pablo Kuczynski was detained on April 10th on similar charges, but was then taken to hospital suffering from high blood pressure.

The Odebrecht net has also ensnared Keiko Fujimori, the leader of the conservative Popular Force party and daughter of a former president, Alberto Fujimori. Both are sitting in prison. She is there for allegedly accepting a $1m campaign contribution from Odebrecht. Her father was convicted of violating human rights during his presidency.

Mr García may have ended his torment. But the consequences of the Odebrecht scandal will be felt for years to come.

vi. 行贿

eg2: The judge was impeached for taking a .
这个法官被检举接受贿赂。
Finally, if nothing about your work itself can motivate you, then try a !
最后，如果工作本身没办法给你激励，那么试试看贿赂自己吧！

几乎每个被参访的人都说他有过贿赂的经历。

ex: n. 恢复；复原

wp.comeback sword: 回风落雁剑法;回峰落雁剑谱;喝了再上剑

eg2: It will be an even harder comeback this time.
这一次，我们的恢复甚至可能更加困难。
He's great in the role of the struggling actor trying to make a comeback after one big success in a series.
他的表演很出色，他扮演的角色是 一个很努力的演员，在一系列大的成功之后，尝试着做个回归。
Now, you might wonder from where you can get the motivation to overcome your fear of failure or comeback after you fail in your pursuit of passion.
在追求热情失败过后，你现在可能想的是哪里能够得到足以克服失败的恐惧或重新复出的动机。

ex: n. 知己；密友

wp.Dark Confidant: 黑暗亲信;亲信;乌明疏疑

eg2: I have been their , their friend, their ally.
我是他们的密友、朋友，他们的同盟。
She had chosen me for her  and I learned all about her quarrels with her lover.
她把我当作知己，于是，我便将她和情人之间的争吵了解得一清二楚。
The best thing to do when we are experiencing pessimistic thoughts is to simply talk it over with a friend, , or professional counselor.
最好的方法是当我们经历悲观的想法时，只需要跟朋友，密友或者专业的心里辅导师讲出来就好了。

ex: n. 后果；结果；重要性
网络 影响；推论；结局
eg2: This decision could have serious consequences for the industry.
这项决定可能对该行业造成严重后果。
Two hundred people lost their jobs as a direct consequence of the merger.
合并一事直接导致二百人失去了工作。
He drove too fast with tragic consequences.
他开车太快，结果酿成惨剧。
to suffer/face/take the consequences of your actions
自食其果；面对╱承担自己行动的后果
Don't worry. It's of no consequence .
别担心，这无关紧要。

ex: v. 收缩；订约；感染
n. 【法】合同；〈非正式〉买凶杀人

eg2: a contract of employment
雇用合同
a research contract
从事研究的合同
to enter into/make/sign a contract with the supplier
与供应商签订合同
These clauses form part of the contract between buyer and seller.
这些条款构成买卖双方所签合同的一部分。
a contract for the supply of vehicles
提供车辆的合约
to win/be awarded a contract to build a new school
获得承建一所新学校的合同
a contract worker(= one employed on a contract for a fixed period of time)
合同工
I was on a three-year contract that expired last week.
我签订的三年期合同已于上周期满。
Under the terms of the contract the job should have been finished yesterday.
根据合同的条款，这项工作本应于昨天完成。
She is under contract to(= has a contract to work for) a major American computer firm.
她已签约为一家大型美国计算机公司工作。
The offer has been accepted, subject to contract(= the agreement is not official until the contract is signed) .
此报价已获接受，尚须以签约为准。
They were sued for breach of contract(= not keeping to a contract) .
他们被指控违约。
to take out a contract on sb
雇凶手杀害某人
Glass contracts as it cools.
玻璃遇冷收缩。
a contracting market
萎缩的市场
The heart muscles contract to expel the blood.
心脏肌肉收缩以挤压出血液。
The exercise consists of stretching and contracting the leg muscles.
此项训练包括伸展和收缩腿部肌肉。
‘I will’ and ‘I shall’ are usually contracted to ‘I'll’(= made shorter) .
I will 和 I shall 通常缩约为 I'll。
to contract AIDS/a virus/a disease
感染艾滋病╱病毒╱疾病
The player is contracted to play until August.
这位选手签约参加比赛到八月份。
Several computer engineers have been contracted to the finance department.
有几位计算机工程师与财务部门签订了合同。
She has contracted to work 20 hours a week.
她已签订每周工作 20 小时的合同。

如果你对某事有自己的信念，那就坚持吧！

He claimed that sex and violence on TV led to the corruption of young people.
他断言电视中所宣扬的色情与暴力诱使青少年堕落。
The word ‘holiday’ is a corruption of ‘holy day’.
单词 holiday 是 holy day 的变体。

ex: vt. 拘留；留住；耽搁
eg2: Although he has permanent US residency rights, he feared that if he approached the police they might detain him because he was not carrying any identification.
虽然穆托享有美国永久居住权，但是他觉得如果他报警也许警察会因为他没有携带任何证件而拘留他。

ex: n. 拘留；延迟；挽留
eg2: The prisoners were discharged from the detention camp.
囚犯们从拘留营获释了。
After about a week at our first detention centre, we were all taken to another place in a truck.
在第一个拘留中心待了大概一周以后，我们被装进卡车，带到另一个地方。
There was no information on whether the government investigated or monitored prison and detention conditions.
没有关于政府是否调查或监督监狱和拘留设施条件的信息。

ex: adj. 灾难性的；损失惨重的；悲伤的
eg2: If he is wrong, the result could be .
如果他是错误的，那么结果将是灾难性的。
The consequences of these actions were .
这些行动的结果是灾难性的。
If global temperatures do go up by the 4C many scientists fear, the impact on Russia would be .
许多科学家担心，如果全球气温升高4摄氏度，对俄罗斯的影响将是灾难性的。

wp.Embassy Inn: 大使酒店;大使饭店;大使馆酒店

ex: n. 大使馆；大使馆全体人员
eg2: She was attached to the Chinese .
她隶属中国大使馆。
Explosive shells torn into the walls of the .
爆炸的炮弹炸穿了大使馆的墙壁。
But this time I asked the (US)  for his exact address, so I’m sure he’ll get it.
不过这次我向美国大使馆问了他的准确地址，所以我相信这次他一定能收到。

ex: vt. 诱捕；诱入陷阱；进入罗网
eg2: Black widow spiders also use their webs to  their prey, which consists of flies, mosquitoes, grasshoppers, beetles, and caterpillars.
黑寡妇蜘蛛也使用它们的网诱捕猎物，包括苍蝇、蚊子、蚱蜢、甲虫和毛虫。
The roadblock has sparked both players and owners to take legal action that could ensnare the NBA in litigation and sink the 2011-2012 season.
这些障碍促使球员和老板双方都采取了法律行动，从而有可能使NBA陷入诉讼风暴，报销2011-2012整个赛季。
That is their role in duality you see, to  you in confusion and doubt.
你瞧，这就 是他们在二元性的角色，让你陷入困惑与怀疑当中。

wp.AEAuto Expose: 自动曝光效果;主动曝光结果

ex: vt. 揭露，揭发；使曝光；显示
eg2: The corrupt official bought off those who might expose him.
那名接受贿赂的官员收买了那些可能会揭发他的人。
And I think that desire to  current events for what they are motivates us.
我认为是那种想报道现在正在发生的事情的愿望激励了我们 。
Her then boss reportedly threatened her if she quit, he would expose her on the Internet.
据说她当时的老板威胁她，如果退出的话他将在网络上曝光她。

wp.To extradite the corrupted officials: 对付贪官外逃和外逃贪官

ex: vt. 引渡；获取…的引渡

eg2: a skin graft
皮移植物
Their success was the result of years of hard graft .
他们的成功是多年艰苦奋斗的结果。
newly grafted tissue
新移植的组织
New skin had to be grafted on from his back.
需从他的背部移植新皮肤。
Old values are being grafted onto a new social class.
旧的价值观念正植根于新的社会阶层。

ex: vt. 使卷入；涉及；暗指；影响

wp.prime implicate: 质蕴含;本原蕴含式;质隐含项

eg2: The findings suggest how the division of labor within couples is structured can implicate health, the researchers say.
研究人员称这些发现揭示出，夫妻间劳动分工模式可影响健康。
So far, the allegations have failed to  the former NoW editor Andy Coulson.
不过到目前为止，这种浪潮还未涉及到现任的编辑安迪.科尔森。

ex: adj. 感人的；令人钦佩的；给人以深刻印象的
eg2: It was impressive how she knew how to manage people and to put them in their place.
这个令我印象深刻，她是如何知道应该怎样管理人们，以及让他们摆正位置。
You have been able to do some impressive things, but one of the goals of SOAP is interoperability.
您本来可以做一些令人印象深刻的工作，但 SOAP 的目标之一是互操作性。
Below you can see some of his impressive work.
以下你能看到他一些极富感染力的作品。

ex: n. 无资格，不胜任；无能力；不适当；不熟练

wp.CONSCIOUS INCOMPETENCE: 知道自己不知道;自觉不足

eg2: I'm not ashamed of my  in these areas.
我对这些领域的无能无力毫不羞愧。
But in the Apple culture of that time, having “A” problems was a sign of .
但是在当时苹果电脑的文化之中，提出A级问题，就是不能胜任的标志。
What is more, Pakistan’s chronic instability and its failure, whether by design or , to suppress extremism make Pakistan as hard a partner for China to trust as for America.
而且，巴方长期的不安定和未能抑制极端主义的做法，不管是出于设计还是无能，都使中国将其看做是与美国一样的难以信赖的伙伴。

通胀率 3%
Wage increases must be in line with inflation .
工资的增长必须与通货膨胀率一致。

当前的通货膨胀率为 3%。
